minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I think we need to address both ai insurance poc development and product demo & technical reviews today.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Customer retention is more important than acquisition right now. Build for POC.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: Have you tried this approach for user adoption? It worked for us.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Well, I think... our accuracy is showing 90% accuracy, and the burn rate is improving.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your training data is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Actually, let me clarify... our training data is showing 93% accuracy, and the ARR is improving.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your ML pipeline is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: We're addressing the accuracy issues and expect ARR to improve next quarter.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: We're facing similar ML pipeline challenges. Let's share learnings.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: We're addressing the latency issues and expect burn rate to improve next quarter.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Investor rejections are normal. Focus on improving your SAM metrics.
